pageContext.claim: “Why do we need border security? This is why. These are the facts. #SecureOurBorder”
pageContext.analysis: The video attached to this tweet outlines a number of the president's talking points for a border wall — including drugs, human trafficking and crime. But most drugs come through legal points of entry and a border wall would do little to stop this. Trump regularly overstates the issues with human trafficking and most independent research contradicts the idea that illegal immigrants bring more crime.
